name: Drop Alive
description: “Happiness is only real when shared, especially with a water drop”. (Isn’t that how it goes?). Take a deep breath and immerse yourself in the greatest journey you’ll ever set out on with the cutest friend.

reviews.review_text: One of the best 2D games played in a while after inside. Minimal graphics with a unique thought.
Fun little platoformer, some unique mechanics too. it's free have fun
This game has great artwork , The music sounds great with the gameplay . Its just a great game and its F2P so you dont have to use any of your money

Okay... credit where credit is due. For a hand-made work,  Drop Alive  is well done. But the main reason I don't recommend it is simply because of its difficulty.  Imagine standing on surfaces too long and dying. Imagine staying as a water drop or cloud for too long and (even when idling) shrinking until you die. Imagine acid pools, acid fountains, and flame spouts instantly murdering you. Of course, let's also imagine electricity and spikes that kill you instantly (sparks quickly shrinking you). Now imagine doing all this...without checkpoints.  I get that this game is hard and I respect their decision to keep it hard...but at the same time, it harms its enjoyability. The 100% token achievement makes it even harder. If challenge is what you wish, good luck. If you want an easy (or casual) 100%, you might want to look elsewhere.  4/10 A difficult experience that caused more anxiety than fun.
You die = you start over that personally annoyed me but over all it's fun cute and great game
